posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Greetings Luck_Dragon!

If the goals are survivable, you have decent saves and 500hp+ plus freedom/death ward so I believe you can say you have achieved that.
RE Planar Turning, in my mind you can take that feat sooner at level 36 perhaps
Power Attack requires Str 13+ so this will need to be pushed backward in your build order.

Unfortunately I have little experience with Planar Turning so I cannot comment about that

Possible tweaks
SpoilerI am curious about the high investment in Paladin, is this something related to your environment, or are you worried about getting dispelled The base AB target is very much environment specific and I believe you or another player more familiar with the environment will be the best judge of this Another thought I had was why Fighter? Was it the bonus feats? Other options I thought of: Ranger 1 epic levels gives you a bonus feat (for Epic Prowess for example) and place to skill dump detection, trapping and search skills Monk will give you wisdom AC and Evasion, you can also drop your armor and shield, Tumble as a class skill for extra AC Hope these ideas help you.
